name: GPConnect-GetStructuredRecord-Operation
description: Get a patient's clinical record in a structured coded format.

parameter.name: patientNHSNumber
parameter.documentation: The NHS number of the patient whose record is being extracted, which must be traced or verified against the national demographics index.

parameter.name: includeAllergies
parameter.documentation: Include resources representing a patient's allergies and intolerances in the response bundle. By default, resolved allergies and intolerances are not included.

part.name: includeResolvedAllergies
part.documentation: Include resolved allergies and intolerances in the response bundle.

parameter.name: includeMedication
parameter.documentation: Include resources representing a patient's medication record in the response bundle.

part.name: includePrescriptionIssues
part.documentation: Include each prescription issue in the response. By default, prescription issues are not included.

part.name: medicationSearchFromDate
part.documentation: Restrict the patient's medication record to those that are active on or after medicationSearchFromDate.

part.name: filterPrescriptionType
part.documentation: Filter the patient's medication records returned according to the specified prescription type(s) for the medicationRequests. Any medicationRequest resources with no prescriptionType code will be included against requests for an acute prescription type.

parameter.name: response
parameter.documentation: The patient structured coded record. This is returned as a bundle containing resources representing the record as requested by the given input parameters.

part.name: consultationSearchPeriod
part.documentation: Restrict consultations by defining a time period.

part.name: includeNumberOfMostRecent
part.documentation: Limit the number of returned consultations.

part.name: filterStatus
part.documentation: Restrict the problems that are returned by their clinical status.

part.name: filterSignificance
part.documentation: Restrict the problems that are returned by their clinical significance.

part.name: includeNotGiven
part.documentation: Include immunisations not given in the response.

part.name: includeStatus
part.documentation: Include information about the status for immunisations in the response.

parameter.name: includeUncategorisedData
parameter.documentation: Include uncategorised data in the response.

part.name: uncategorisedDataSearchPeriod
part.documentation: Restrict uncategorised data by defining a time period.

parameter.name: includeDiaryEntries
parameter.documentation: Include diary entries in the response.

part.name: diaryEntriesSearchDate
part.documentation: Include diary entries prior to the the diaryEntriesSearchDate.

part.name: investigationSearchPeriod
part.documentation: Restrict the investigations that are returned by defining a time period.

part.name: referralSearchPeriod
part.documentation: Restrict uncategorised data by defining a time period.
